activities: Compuware transfers data from the EU primarily for employee benefit and service administration, human resource management, corporate security and general corporate business processes.  Limited customer data is transferred from the EU for product registration, support, internal sales, marketing and data processing.  Personal data from some of our customers, their European subsidiaries and their business partners and customers, is transferred to the US for processing, messaging and data exchanges between and among European entities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) of Switzerland.
